thread.title: EastEnders

author: Fiona Flynn
title: EastEnders
text: Emotions continue to run high in Albert Square when Ian demands answers from his mother. Can he forgive her? And isn't it about time somebody told Ben? Speaking of, after an awkward run-in with Paul, Ben follows him to the toilets and they open up about losing a parent (which he hasn't actually, as we all know). With Ben sincere about wanting to help Paul, he agrees to meet him later and go for a drink. However, later on when Paul goes to meet him he spots Abi and Ben together and isn't too impressed. Although we have a funny feeling that a shook Ben may be only seeking comfort from Abi after seeing a ghost from his past... and doesn't she just look delighted about it.
